description: Centralized mistake log for cross-session retrospective analysis with pattern linkage

documentation.purpose: Mistakes logged here by learn-from-mistakes skill (Phase 9) for pattern identification
documentation.pattern_linkage: Each mistake links to a pattern_id in retrospectives.json for effectiveness tracking
documentation.effectiveness_check: Query mistakes WHERE pattern_id = X AND timestamp > action_item.completed_date
documentation.processed_in_retrospective: ID of retrospective that analyzed this mistake (R001, R002, etc.)
documentation.data_retention: Mistakes never deleted. Full audit trail preserved for temporal analysis.

mistakes.root_cause: Agents not properly directed to their agent-specific worktrees

mistakes.description: Task tool invoked without proper state transition
mistakes.root_cause: Task tool used from INIT state or without requirements reports

mistakes.description: Destructive operations executed without confirmation
mistakes.root_cause: No verification before destructive git or file operations

mistakes.root_cause: No protection for version branches during history rewriting

mistakes.root_cause: Code style rules not followed during implementation

mistakes.root_cause: PMD rules not followed - code quality issues

mistakes.root_cause: Hook only detected complex patterns, not simple 'I made a mistake'

mistakes.description: Agent role misassignment - engineer assigned for testing tasks
mistakes.root_cause: Confused engineer (code quality) with tester (test strategy)

mistakes.description: Cherry-picked files from commit based on stale main, causing 60 lines of switch-parsing code to be removed
mistakes.root_cause: File extraction commands (git show/checkout) return entire file content from that commit, not just changes. If source commit was based on older main, extracted files have stale base code.

mistakes.description: Ran 'git reflog expire --expire=now --all && git gc --prune=now' immediately after git filter-branch, permanently destroying recovery options
mistakes.root_cause: Documentation in git-rebase skill showed reflog expire and gc prune as normal cleanup step without warning about when this is dangerous. Agent followed documentation pattern without understanding implications.

mistakes.description: Parser tests using isNotNull() on arena instead of isEqualTo(expected) - tests nothing about AST structure
mistakes.root_cause: Documentation only prohibited isNotEmpty() but not isNotNull() on arena, which has the same problem of only verifying parsing succeeded

mistakes.description: Archival files committed as separate 4th commit instead of being included in docs commit when using code/docs/config separation pattern
mistakes.root_cause: Documentation gap - no explicit guidance on archival placement in multi-commit patterns; agent added archival as new commit instead of amending existing docs commit

mistakes.description: Applied brace omission rule incorrectly - removed braces from statements spanning multiple visual lines
mistakes.root_cause: Documentation used 'single-line' ambiguously without clarifying it means ONE VISUAL LINE, not just one statement. Multi-line throw statements were incorrectly treated as single-line.

mistakes.description: Added @SuppressWarnings(PMD.NcssCount) to Parser.java without attempting decomposition first
mistakes.root_cause: Took easy suppression path without verifying if refactoring was actually infeasible. Rationalized that shared state made extraction hard without actually attempting it.

mistakes.description: Manual byte offset calculation errors in parser test - wrote positions (23,46,49,55,57,58) when actual were (22,45,47,53,55,56)
mistakes.root_cause: Manually calculated byte offsets in source string instead of using placeholder technique to verify positions

mistakes.description: Parser test expected values derived from actual output without verification - From actual comments prove blind copying
mistakes.root_cause: Placeholder technique (write 0,0, run, update) was followed but VERIFICATION step was skipped. Comments like // From actual output: prove values were copied without verifying correctness.

mistakes.description: git-merge-linear-optimized.sh cleanup tried to delete branch before removing worktree
mistakes.root_cause: Script executed git branch -D before git worktree remove. Git prevents deleting a branch that's checked out in an active worktree, causing error message.

mistakes.description: Plan deviation without informing user - Changed plan (removed --parallel flag) but didn't announce until user asked
mistakes.root_cause: No mandatory checkpoint requiring announcement of plan changes before implementation. Agent proceeded with deviation silently.

mistakes.description: Merged without user review - Committed changes and marked plan complete without pausing for user review
mistakes.root_cause: No mandatory user review checkpoint before committing plan implementation. Agent assumed implementation was correct.

mistakes.description: Misattributed change source - Claimed change was due to user feedback when actually due to discovering existing code API
mistakes.root_cause: Relied on memory/summary instead of verifying actual conversation sequence via get-history. Memory was inaccurate about cause-and-effect.

mistakes.description: Did not invoke get-history when doing root cause analysis for learn-from-mistakes
mistakes.root_cause: learn-from-mistakes skill did not require conversation verification step. Agent proceeded with analysis based on memory which was inaccurate.

mistakes.description: Did not update retrospectives/mistakes.json when learning from mistakes
mistakes.root_cause: learn-from-mistakes skill did not require retrospectives logging step. Agent stated prevention but didn't log for cross-session tracking.

mistakes.description: False positive in Pattern 7 (git_operation_failure) when grepping JSON content from session history
mistakes.root_cause: Pattern 7 matched text like 'fatal:' and 'error:' inside JSON string values when grepping session history files. No filtering for JSON content.

mistakes.description: Used relative .claude/ paths in mistakes.json instead of ${CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR}/.claude/
mistakes.root_cause: No guidance in learn-from-mistakes skill specifying that paths must use ${CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR}. Followed existing pattern without considering working directory changes.

mistakes.description: Edited plugin cache (~/.config/claude/plugins/cache/) instead of source (/workspace/claude-code-cat/)
mistakes.root_cause: Skill files are invoked from cache directory. When fixing bugs, edited the deployed cache instead of the source repository. Changes would be lost on next plugin update.

mistakes.description: Used git rebase directly instead of git-rebase skill
mistakes.root_cause: No PreToolUse hook to remind about git-rebase skill for non-interactive rebase

mistakes.description: Missed user squash request embedded in system-reminder during tool output
mistakes.root_cause: Continued analyzing grep output instead of processing system-reminder containing user request
mistakes.correct_behavior: STOP current analysis, add user request to TodoWrite, acknowledge

mistakes.description: Retrospective files written to .claude/retrospectives/ instead of .claude/cat/retrospectives/
mistakes.root_cause: Followed existing files at wrong location instead of skill documentation path
mistakes.correct_behavior: Always use .claude/cat/retrospectives/ and migrate files if found at wrong location

mistakes.description: Retrospective counter showed 1-2 when actual mistakes since last retrospective was 11
mistakes.root_cause: Mistake recording and counter increment not atomic - mistakes added without incrementing counter
mistakes.correct_behavior: Validate counter matches actual mistake count before incrementing, auto-fix if mismatch

mistakes.description: Subagent added @SuppressWarnings(PMD.NcssCount) despite explicit prohibition in java-style.md. Main agent review missed the violation.
mistakes.root_cause: PostToolUse hook could not actually block edits - only warned after the fact. Subagent ignored or did not see warning.
mistakes.correct_behavior: Never add @SuppressWarnings(PMD.NcssCount). Instead refactor to reduce complexity.

mistakes.description: Used git merge --no-ff creating merge commit instead of ff-merge for linear history
mistakes.root_cause: No enforcement blocking --no-ff flag in merge commands
mistakes.correct_behavior: Use --ff-only for merges or /cat:git-merge-linear skill to maintain linear history

mistakes.description: Used feature: prefix for retrospective action item implementation instead of bugfix:
mistakes.root_cause: Did not recognize that action items are corrective fixes for identified problems, not new functionality
mistakes.correct_behavior: Use bugfix: prefix for all retrospective action item implementations
